storyInfo: Angelina finds an unaddressed package. With Croissant's help, she searches for its owner.

attributes.content: Mm! Hmm hmm~! Let's see... all the letters, specialty packages, high value insured mail-order goodies. All checked off.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Wonderful! That's all the work there is for today!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: What should I do first? Take a hot bath, maybe enjoy a cup of milk tea first? I still have a bit of that orange cream cake left.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Wait, stop it, Angelina! You promised yourself to keep your weight under... Uh, to eat healthier?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Howdy there, Angelina! Ya clockin' out too, huh? Wanna come along and check out the goodies I got comin' in?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sure... *Yawn*.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, Croissant. I couldn't fight that yawn. It's getting pretty late already.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Well, ya see, I ordered a custom hairpin from that one accessory shop down in Lungmen ya pointed out last time.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ya don't know the trouble I had to go through just to get the old man there to keep me ten of those trinkets. I guarantee there's something in there you'll like.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh, but...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'You'll get bags under yer eyes if ya turn in late,' right? Ya sound like a broken record, 'fcourse I know.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Alright, I'll keep yer stuff safe. Ya just come to me when you have time. Ya can count on good ol' Croissant to look after her friends!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yep~ You're the best, Croissant!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Haha, if t'weren't for the fashion magazines ya lent me and all them notes you put in there, no way I could've picked out stuff that good.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: My last few hauls of clothes and accessories've been mighty popular with the folks at Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I'm rakin' in a healthy hunk o' dough this month, much thanks to that. Let's get somethin' to eat come a day off next week.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What'cha like? Barbecue? Pizza? Maybe even them Yan hotpots?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Uh, that's music to my tummy and mouth... but...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: But ya gotta 'keep yer weight in check,' right?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: ...I gotta eat healthy.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Well, true, there's no need to worry about yer weight fer someone like you. Just sayin' so makes me jealous.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: How about we put out a little pamphlet next time? Somethin' like, '101 Weight Loss Tips for Cuties...'
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hold on, are you sure that'd sell?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: A girl can dream, can't she? Might could be there's some folks out there what don't know you, and are gullible enough.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Like that MountainDash boy who joined us last time. The li'l weightlifting contest you two had? Made me some decent money.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We were picking on the new kid. Are you sure you should be gloating about it?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Eh, I'm just usin' information to my advantage. Whether it's business or Messenger work, information's king.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Hm... yeah, but it still... kinda bothers me a little. Maybe we'll treat Bison to some cake next time.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Alright, time to head home!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Huh, what's that by your door?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh... Is that a package? What's a package doing here?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I already delivered everything I got today.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: It's wrapped in pink, it smells nice, and it feels kinda... square? Probably a book.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Think it's them novels 'n magazines you like to read?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The magazines show up at a set time every month, and I got everything I ordered this month already. There shouldn't be any more.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Besides, I've been getting quite a bit of delivery and logistics work lately. My schedule's so full, I haven't had time to read any new novels at all.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: It's a present, then?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: A present? O-Of course not. Why would anyone give me a present?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Now that ain't all that wild, is it? Yer such a hottie, put two 'n two together.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: There's just no way, I'm telling you...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: It's not addressed to anyone. I'm guessing it came with something else and was meant to be delivered together.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I was kinda in a rush this morning, so it probably fell out of my bag by accident.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: *Sigh*, I screwed up again...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Eh, no big deal. You just gotta deliver it again!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Better get to it then.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Huh, now? Tomorrow'd be a-okay, yeah? You just said it's gettin' late.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Someone once told me, 'If you are to correct your mistakes, there is no time better than the present.'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: We've been to a few places already, but we still haven't found who the package is for.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: There aren't any clues or anything on the thing itself, so I guess we're gonna have to keep trying every place I delivered to today.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Sorry, Croissant. I didn't mean to have you run all over the place with me.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I tagged along 'cause I wanted to.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: 'sides, get in some exercise at night and you wake up all bright-eyed and bushy-tailed the next day.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You sure you ain't tired? You been runnin' all up and down.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I'm fine... Well, maybe a little, but it's nothing compared to how worried and disappointed the recipient of the package is.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Well, if that ain't proof that you're one of the finest Messengers there is, I don't know what is.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: R-Really? I always thought I still have a long way to go.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Eh, reminds me of when I first came to Rhodes Island. This real pretty high school girl came up to me, asking me to teach her how to be a better Messenger. I was real surprised!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That just tells you how amazing Penguin Logistics is! I mean, it was founded by that Emperor! I'd already heard of you guys when I was still back home!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I knew right away you must be a great Messenger when I saw you carrying all those packages like it was nothing, so that's why I mustered up the courage to talk to you.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Great Messenger! Haha, I wish you'd told Texas or the Baws that! Could've gotten me a raise or somethin'.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Thinking back, I just felt like I could never do anything right when I first got here... I'm glad you're here, Croissant.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Huh? I ain't done nothin'! Does that time you lost a package 'n started crying, and I handed you some tissues count?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I wasn't just crying because I lost a package...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit said I could choose a combat assignment or go to Logistics, where I would get some long-term field ops like the other Messengers getting treatment on the ship.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: And I chose combat.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit agreed with my decision since she thought my abilities could be put to good use on the battlefield after some training.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: But, deep down in my heart, I was still uncertain about a lot of things.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: So why'd you decide to start fightin' anyway, Angelina? You don't look like the clobberin' type.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I... Well, I guess it's probably because I want to be just a little more awesome.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I don't want to give anyone trouble, and I don't want to always have to hide behind everyone else.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I wanted to become an adult who could stand on her own right away. Just like Dr. Kal'tsit and... and... like {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I guess that probably makes me kinda greedy? I wanted to go to the front lines, but I didn't want to give up my work as a Messenger either.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I couldn't do anything well back then, and all that training would always leave me exhausted each and every day.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Then, the next day, I'd find Rhodes Island in a completely different place than the day before. I didn't even know how to get anywhere when I had to make deliveries...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Is that why you were cryin' your eyes out all a sudden?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Well yank my tail and call me Sora! I sure am a dummy for missin' that!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: No, you're not. You were so patient and helped me find my way. You were my hero.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Haha, that's just how you take care of a rookie! We all gotta start somewhere!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And how can you call yourself greedy? Workin' yer fluff off all 'cause you wanna get better? That's darned normal, if you ask me.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Take yours truly, I'm giving hustlin' every day just to make myself more money!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yeah, and I'm always trying to learn from you.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Huh? What do ya mean?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Well, you don't ever get hung up on the things that don't matter...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Even when you're working on your Rhodes Island missions, you always have a couple dozen packages with completely different delivery routes, and you always have the day's purchases figured out on top of that! You're like a superstar mentor!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Whoowee, I sure didn't know I was that amazin.' All I ever do is try my darndest to git 'er done, 'n beat up all the bad guys what come my way like, bam bam bam!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Just like that! Bam bam!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: When you get to whacking, it's like it blows away all the worries on my mind.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Eh, when you put it like that, it makes a girl blush.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And ya know, I always thought you were one amazin' girl yerself. That's as a Rhodes Island operator and as a Messenger.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And I know I ain't nothin' like you.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The reason I became a Messenger is cause the Baws is sincere and honest and got plenty of money. It so happens I'm good at it, and the gals make it a mighty fun place to be.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You ain't like me. Yer passionate about this line o' work, and ya actually care about how the senders 'n recipients feel.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Actually, that's exactly the reason I became a Messenger.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: No kiddin'?!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Back when I'd just left home, for the first few days, all I could do was hide in an old neighborhood close by. I didn't go out until nighttime because I was too afraid.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: It was almost winter. The wind was humid and chilly, and I was still wearing the skirt I wore on my last day to school. My whole body had gone all numb.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I was like an aimless ghost just wandering around.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Then, a Messenger found me, or should I say I found him?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: He was delivering letters right next door.  When they got the letters, the recipients smiled at him, and it felt like that smile was for me too. It kind of... warmed me up a little.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: And that's how you became a Messenger?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The opportunity was right there, so I took it. I had lots to learn, and it was all very difficult, but it was also very fulfilling.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: After that, I started to believe that your interpersonal relationships are what really make you feel real, alive, existent.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Ever since I left all the people that knew me, this Angelina has started to fade away bit by bit.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Eh, sounds horrible.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yeah, looking back, I guess it kind of does.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: After that, I started giving delivery a shot.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: To my surprise, each and every time I hand over a package or a letter to somebody, the smiles on their faces did truly give me something.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: It's only during these times that... I feel like I've come a little closer to all those emotions I once knew.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: So I kept delivering. I kept experiencing those emotions between people, and I began to slowly find who I once was, who Angelina used to be.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: You ain't the only one who gets those feelings, y'know? Them recipients get all glopped up by yer earnestness just the same. Like that pawpaw just now. You saw how happy he was to see you again?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Too bad. He said the package wasn't his.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'I got a grandson working out in the cities. He sent me that package of souvenirs—'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'They're some really sweet tangerines.'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'That book you got is probably meant for somebody else. I'm old. My eyes aren't what they used to be. Neo wouldn't send me a book.'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Well, he's right. A good grandson wouldn't send his pawpaw things he couldn't use.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Gotta say, though... These are some darn sweet tangerines.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Not only did we not do anything, he even shared his souvenirs with us.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Life's little corners're full o' surprises. Just on this trip, we got us some tangerines, 'n we also almost got beat up. Who'd'a thunk it?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Well, I didn't expect the same guy who ordered the new 'Moon & Lavender' velvet scarf and pajamas set would turn into some dangerous gangster at night!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: If I'd known, I wouldn't have asked him if he ordered a new 'Moon & Lavender' catalogue outright like an idiot!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: That was so funny, though! Cracked me right up!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That's right. Everyone could hear you laugh.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Just thinkin' about that scar-faced guy, how he'n and them two other fellers looked! If you said just one more word, they just might'a put us six feet under! Hahahaha...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I feel kinda bad, though. Maybe he really didn't want anyone else to know he bought that? That was my mistake. Thank goodness you were there to smooth things over.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'Much appreciated, Baws. We hope you and the lady will be satisfied with yer purchase today. Next time, how 'bout a catalogue too~?'
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sounds just like a salesperson, no?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yeah, very professional.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Great! Gotta get it memorized, then! The next time I go on deliveries, maybe I should take this on as a side job! Can't get enough side jobs!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: He's probably really fond of that item, though... I can't imagine him spending this much on insurance otherwise. I sure hope he'll be able to share his hobbies with everyone someday, openly.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: This might just be the significance we Messengers have. It keeps him that much more at ease when it's a stranger that delivers his items.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: But I betrayed his trust this time.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Looks like I gotta work even harder.
attributes.name: Angelina
